amendment.description: Amendment increases the maximum number of entities eligible to participate in competency-based demonstration projects from 20 to 30.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in Part A of House Report 113-546 to increase the maximum number of eligible entities from 20 to 30.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Byrne amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Byrne amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A005) offered by Mr. Byrne.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
